title: Homeric Hymns To Demeter 1-3
body: analysis of the circumstances in which the hymnic salutation khaire/khairete is not followed by a metabasis (explicit or otherwise), here the ambiguity of whether a new subject is taken up in verse 3 or the same one from verse 1 is restarted

title: Homeric Hymns To Demeter 3
body: in a list of examples where the hymnic salutation khaire/khairete is not followed by an explicit metabasis
